channel.title: Need hoster
channel.description:
[size=30pt]need hoster[/size]
i have been runing a server latly and my friend (that was hosting) comp broke and my router is fucked so now i'm stuffed
requirements: a brain
if you decide to host for me then add me on skype dylan.hurley3 you will get all owner benefits in server and a choice of what goes on in the server

item.title: Need hoster
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Hosters are the exception, normally hosters aren’t part of the development team unless they’re a programmer/developer as well. If you want programmers and developers, go ahead and start a development team. If not, sorry, but requesting a hoster isn’t allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: Need hoster
item.dc:creator: @tinyscape TinyScape
item.description:
@tinyscape wrote:

You cannot request a hoster here sorry. If you want a team, just go to the ‘Development teams’ section and make a detailed post about your server and what kind of places you have open (e.g. Server developer, Hoster ect…)

Read full topic
